name: shawn.co
body:
### QuickStar
Finally created a proper home for [QuickStar](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/quickstar/gfleimmfkgmjkaclmaeanlkcnhhfldje) outside of the Chrome web store.

[QuickStar Github page](http://scarrillo.github.io/QuickStar/).


### Experimenting with Github Pages
I like the idea of having a simple version controlled weblog based on github.
Let's see if this motivates me more than using the wordpress installation over at [shawn.co](http://shawn.co) 

Sample code support:
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
